metadata.title: USN-6580-1 -- w3m vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that w3m incorrectly handled certain HTML files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6580-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  w3m-img - 0.5.3+git20230121-2ubuntu0.23.10.1 w3m - 0.5.3+git20230121-2ubuntu0.23.10.1 No subscription required
